name: Circle K International ðŸ’™
description:
Our mission is to develop college students into responsible citizens and leaders with a lifelong commitment to serving our community. Our club adheres to the tenets of service, leadership, and fellowship. For 30 years we have organized hundreds of service projects, racked up tens of thousands of service hours, and raised thousands of dollars for charity.

We benefit the community through these projects, in which we take on tasks such as cleaning up the environment, serving food to low-income families, putting on free educational workshops for underprivileged children, making no-sew blankets for animals in the shelter, and raising money for charities such as the Pediatric Trauma Program, The Environmental Defense Fund, the Kiwanis Family House at the UC Davis Medical Hospital, and the NAACP Legal Defense & Education Fund. In addition to all the service we do, we focus on creating a community through a variety of socials, from eating out, to karaoke, to San Francisco trips, and more, through our family system, and our mentor-mentee system and alumni network!

 

If you're interested in joining us here at UC Berkeley CKI for the 2025-2026 term and to stay in the loop about our activities, fill out our interest form (we accept everyone!) today: https://forms.gle/fRUt8vcoWwb2kLHs5

We also ask you to check out our website, ucbcki.org, for more information on us, and our calendar, and to sign up for events. This way, you can also keep track of the events you've attended and your hours!

And if you're interested in a board position and leadership training, we are currently accepting applications for our appointed board! Incoming freshmen, junior transfers, and all other students who will be at Berkeley for the 2025-2026 term are welcome to apply. We just ask that you are enthusiastic and can dedicate your time to the club. Email cki.yanisachai@gmail.com (2025-2026 President, Yanisa Chaisomboonpan) to let us know you're interested, and then apply to board here today!: https://forms.gle/xRnx2bRvfi7nsTff7

For any important links, please check out our Linktr.ee: linktr.ee/UCB_CKI/
summary: Our mission is to develop students into leaders with a lifelong commitment to serving our community through mentorship and fellowship. We adhere to the tenets of service, leadership, and fellowship. Check out @ucbcki on Instagram for more information!
